akka.cluster.ddata

Class PNCounterMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.cluster.ddata.PNCounterMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemovedNodePruning, ReplicatedData, ReplicatedDataSerialization, java.io.Serializable

    public final class PNCounterMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReplicatedData, ReplicatedDataSerialization, RemovedNodePruning
    Map of named counters. Specialized ORMap with PNCounter values.

    This class is immutable, i.e. "modifying" methods return a new instance.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
